experiences.title: Full Stack Developer
experiences.subtitle: Wubble.ai Pte Ltd, Singapore
workDescription: Delivered Wubble.ai's **B2B AI-music platform** — a responsive, multi-modal web app using **React.js** and **Tailwind** — that enabled enterprises to generate royalty-free tracks from text, image, video, or audio prompts with near-instant previews; reduced first-preview time from **30s to < 5s**.
Designed and deployed **RESTful APIs** with optimized **PostgreSQL** schemas for music assets, billing, analytics, and RBAC; achieved **99% uptime** and reduced query latency by **30%**.

Built a secure, low-latency **audio-streaming pipeline** on **Google Cloud** using Cloud Memorystore (Redis) and Cloud Storage that delivered instant previews of AI-composed tracks; reduced first-byte latency by **50%**.

Developed **Stripe-integrated billing**, enterprise **RBAC** team workflows, and payment tracking, enabling same-day onboarding and automated invoicing for clients; achieved **99% payment uptime** and reduced manual finance effort by **50%**.

Automated **Google Cloud infrastructure** with **Terraform** and **Docker**, enabling zero-downtime rollouts; reduced deploy time from **20 min to 5 min** and trimmed monthly cloud spend **25%** via autoscaling.

Implemented **unit and integration testing** using **Jest** and **Cypress**, and conducted cross-browser/device compatibility testing with **LambdaTest**; enhanced application stability and user experience across various environments.

experiences.title: Freelance ML Engineer
experiences.subtitle: Finstein Advisory Service LLP, Singapore
workDescription: Built a **machine learning–based revenue forecasting tool** that connects to **QuickBooks**, allows users to upload or fetch revenue data, select variables and models, and generate revenue forecasts.
Developed the solution using **Python**, **Streamlit**, and **scikit-learn** with **Intuit QuickBooks API** integration for seamless data import and processing.
Created an intuitive interface that enables users to select independent and dependent variables and choose from multiple ML models on the fly to predict revenue trends.
